title: Spacious 3br/2.5ba in Vintana Subdivision
posting_body: ['Very well located in Windsor, in the desirable Vintana Subdivision with its own central park and very near the Windsor High, Windsor golf course, as well as the Town Green with all of its wonderful seasonal activities, this lovely 2-story 3br/2.5ba 1850 sq.', 'ft. home has central heat and AC, vaulted ceilings, a gorgeous kitchen, beautiful and newly graveled yards front and back, with His & Hers garages on each side of the home, both with extra storage shelving.', 'Come on up the walkway past the beautiful Japanese Maple and roses, and enter this home under the large covered front porch with enough room for a café table for two.', ' From the tiled entry, enjoy the main floor’s high ceilings and expansive Great Room which includes living and dining areas, gourmet kitchen, and a convenient half bath.', 'The living room is on the left with a triple shutterblinded window covered by lovely drapes, a full glass shutterblinded door to the back patio and yard, a recessed cubby for your entertainment center, and a gas ceramic logged fireplace to enjoy the romantic flicker of the firelight.', ' The fireplace is dressed with a beautiful stone mantle and the entire home is painted in peaceful, warm, and relaxing hues.', ' A subwall separates the living space from the dining and kitchen with large cutouts to create a very open and airy feeling.', ' The living room is fully carpeted as is the dining area which has a beautiful custom chandelier and a vertical blinded double glass slider which leads to the fully fenced backyard with a concrete patio and newly graveled area.', 'The ‘heart’ of the home is the beautiful gourmet kitchen with granite tiled countertops and island, abundant underlit cabinetry with two architectural windows above providing ambient light.', ' There is also a large honeycomb blinded opening double window over the deep white, double, porcelain Kohler sink, with a large Moen faucet and pullout wand for your kitchen clean up.', ' The beautiful granite island awaits your stools for the ‘backseat chefs’ while your meals are prepared on a newer GE Spectra XL44 4-burner gas range with an extra large self cleaning oven and a built-in GE microwave with vent above.', ' The floors in the kitchen are beautiful medium colored hardwood oak and there is also a small pantry and a convenient half bath is just off the kitchen on the main floor.', ' One of the inside access doors to the garages is off of the entry and the other at the other side of the main level off the kitchen.', 'Now on up the carpeted stairs to the upstairs bedrooms and bathrooms with beautiful banisters and railings leading the way.', ' The upstairs also has high ceilings and just to the left of the stairwell on the upper level is a built-in desk and workstation area, with cupboards for storage and linens.', ' There are also two shutterblinded windows over the stairway and one shutterblinded window providing ambient light for the workstation.', 'To the far left is the large Master Suite with cathedral ceilings, a ceiling fan/light combo, dual windows on each side of the wall where the bed will be, as well as two more shutterblinded windows looking out over the backyard, into the treetops, providing a treehouse view.', ' The Master bedroom also has a built-in cubby with cabling for your entertainment center with His & Hers closets on each side.', ' The entire upstairs is wall to wall carpet but for linoleum flooring in the indoor laundry and water closet areas of both bathrooms.', 'As you enter the Master’s beautiful ensuite bath, you will find an additional large walk-in closet, a dual sinked Corian-topped His & Hers vanity with custom sconce lights above, an oversized soaking tub, and a freestanding shower.', ' Two honeycomb shaded windows in the main bathroom area and one small silhouette blinded window in the private water closet provide more beautiful ambient light.', 'The middle room of the upper floor is the second guest bedroom/study/entertainment room with a ceiling fan and a bi-fold doored closet with hanging bar and shelf, as well as cablingyou’re your AV needs.', ' This bedroom also has a double wooden entry door with one side able to be fixed to the door frame and floor and the other side opening and closing for entry.', ' At the far side of the upstairs is the third bedroom and at the very end of the hallway is an indoor laundry with built in cabinets above and washer and dryer hookups (gas and electric).', 'Finally, at this far end of the home on the second floor is the shared guest bathroom with a dual sinked Corian-topped vanity, full wall mirror, a silhouette blinded opening window, and a private water closet with glass doored shower over tub combo.', 'After experiencing this special virtual preview, you must be ready to schedule an appointment to see this special home!', ' Please contact us to arrange a viewing!', '$3200/mo; 1-year lease; Available NOW', '$4000 security deposit', '$100 per month "Pet Rent" per pet, up to 2 pets.', 'Small (up to 39lbs) well behaved pets will be considered', 'Low maintenance yard to be maintained by tenant (water trees and bushes, and yard weeded)']
